title: Twitch Streaming
body:
Hey guys, my name is madman.
I have started twitch streaming and to get things really going, i've decided to do a little give away. On christmas day i will be giving a $25 gift card code to one of my followers whom I will select randomly. I am also a silver player who deals with elo hell 24/7 and I make it as fun as possible when it comes to norms!
My stream is a little laggy, but thats what macs do :X

I am currently streaming so check it out! {{champion:121}} {{champion:107}}
